Sorry!\""},{"lineNumber":239935,"originalJapaneseLine":"シィルが霧の中に飲み込まれるように","translatedEnglishLine":"Siil disappeared as if swallowed by the fog."},{"lineNumber":239936,"originalJapaneseLine":"姿を消した。","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":239937,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……ふん、最近のシィル、調子に乗ってるな。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmph, Siil's been getting rather cocky lately."},{"lineNumber":239938,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ここは一度ビシッと立場の違いを……」","translatedEnglishLine":"It's about time to firmly remind her of the difference in status...\""},{"lineNumber":239939,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ん？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hm?\""},{"lineNumber":239940,"originalJapaneseLine":"ぶつぶつ言いながら歩いているランスは","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance, muttering to himself as he walked,"},{"lineNumber":239941,"originalJapaneseLine":"足下が突然なくなったことに気づいた。","translatedEnglishLine":"suddenly realized the ground beneath him had disappeared."},{"lineNumber":239942,"originalJapaneseLine":"「どわぁぁぁぁぁ〜！？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Whoaahhhhhh~!?"},{"lineNumber":239943,"originalJapaneseLine":"　崖だーーーー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"It's a cliff----!\""},{"lineNumber":239944,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスが落ちながら","translatedEnglishLine":"While falling, Lance"},{"lineNumber":239945,"originalJapaneseLine":"なんとか崖っぷちにしがみついた。","translatedEnglishLine":"managed to cling onto the edge of the cliff."},{"lineNumber":239946,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はあはあ……死ぬかと思った……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Huff, huff... I thought I was going to die..."},{"lineNumber":239947,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ギリギリセーフ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"That was a close call...\""},{"lineNumber":239948,"originalJapaneseLine":"「くう、霧のせいで足下がまったく見えん。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Guh, because of the fog I can't see my feet at all."},{"lineNumber":239949,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ぼーっとしてると危険な山だ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"It's a dangerous mountain if you’re not paying attention...\""},{"lineNumber":239950,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ランス！？　大きな声を出してどうしたのー！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Lance!? Why did you shout so loudly!?\""},{"lineNumber":239951,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ちょっと崖から落ちただけだ、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I just fell off the cliff a little,"}]}

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "? What are you talking about, wan?"
"Ah, no, it's nothing."
"So, more importantly now,"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 重要なのは任務の方です」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the important thing is the mission."
"Y-Yeah, that's right, wan."
"Umm, according to the memo from Lord Cavebris..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もらったメモによると……」
『ケイブワン、魔王リトルプリンセスが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'Cavewan, swiftly check whether the Demon Lord Little Princess is on Mt. Surume.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: スルメ山にいるかサクッと確認してこい』
『あ、お前では絶対に敵わないから
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'Ah, you absolutely cannot fight her,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 絶対に手を出すな。犬死にするぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: do not engage her at all. You'll die a pointless death.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 確認するだけでいいからな』
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Just confirm her presence and that's all.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うん、確認だけでＯＫって言ってるわん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yeah, they said just confirming is OK, wan."
"Y-Yes, that's right.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 既に魔王リトルプリンセスがいるのは確認済み」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We've already confirmed the Demon Lord Little Princess is there."
"However... if things continue like this,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 先程の人類軍に魔王を奪われる可能性が……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: there's a possibility the human army from earlier could steal the Demon Lord..."
"...I'm going back."
Is, is that really okay?"
"Because..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人間の部隊と遭遇したら倒せとは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I wasn't told to defeat the human troops if we encounter them.
That's what I mean, wan."
"Well, that may be true, but..."
"Sniff, sniff..."
Just forget it, I'm going home..."
"A-Alright..."
I wonder if it's really okay..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブワン達はサクサクと下山していった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Cavewan and the others quickly descended the mountain.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達は霧で目の前もよく見えない中、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance and the others, unable to see clearly ahead because of the fog,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 慎重にスルメ山を進んでいた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: were cautiously making their way up Mt. Surume.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「シィルー、ちゃんとついてこいよー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Siil, make sure you keep up!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ランス様、出来るだけ近くに……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Lord Lance, let's stay as close as possible..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: わっ、わっ、見失っちゃいそうです……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: W-w-w-we're almost losing sight..."
"U-um... shall we... hold hands?"
"Hold hands?"
"Yes.
My heart is pounding..."
"You idiot, don't get cocky."
"Ouch!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それより後ろの方に行って水をもらってこい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "More importantly, go to the back and get some water."
"Y-Yes! Sorry!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シィルが霧の中に飲み込まれるように
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Siil disappeared as if swallowed by the fog.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……ふん、最近のシィル、調子に乗ってるな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmph, Siil's been getting rather cocky lately.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここは一度ビシッと立場の違いを……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's about time to firmly remind her of the difference in status..."
"Hm?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ぶつぶつ言いながら歩いているランスは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance, muttering to himself as he walked,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 足下が突然なくなったことに気づいた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: suddenly realized the ground beneath him had disappeared.
"Whoaahhhhhh~!?
It's a cliff----!"
While falling, Lance

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんとか崖っぷちにしがみついた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: managed to cling onto the edge of the cliff.
"Huff, huff... I thought I was going to die...
That was a close call..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「くう、霧のせいで足下がまったく見えん。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Guh, because of the fog I can't see my feet at all.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ぼーっとしてると危険な山だ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's a dangerous mountain if you’re not paying attention..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ランス！？　大きな声を出してどうしたのー！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Lance!? Why did you shout so loudly!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ちょっと崖から落ちただけだ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I just fell off the cliff a little,

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんとか崖っぷちにしがみついた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: managed to cling onto the edge of the cliff.
"Huff, huff... I thought I was going to die...
That was a close call..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「くう、霧のせいで足下がまったく見えん。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Guh, because of the fog I can't see my feet at all.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ぼーっとしてると危険な山だ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's a dangerous mountain if you’re not paying attention..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ランス！？　大きな声を出してどうしたのー！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Lance!? Why did you shout so loudly!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ちょっと崖から落ちただけだ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I just fell off the cliff a little,
